lyrics.stanza: We all with unveiled face, Beholding and reflecting as a mirror The glory of the Lord, Are being transformed into the same image
(Sing the following in rounds; brothers start first)
From glory to glory, from glory to glory, From glory to glory, we are being transformed.
(Brothers:) From glory to glory, from glory to glory, (Sisters:) ...From glory to glory, (Everyone:) From glory to glory, Even as from the Lord Spirit.
